name: Millie's Messenger
description: Millie's Messenger is a live messenging app that can be used as a template for incorporating Socket.IO, MongoDB Change Streams, Express, React.js, Node.js and JSON Web Tokens/ Bearer Authorization. To test Live Site, Login with username: Test  password: testuser

name: FotoBook
description: A reverse engineering of Instagram with login/ authorization, profiles, posting, commenting, and editing functionality. User can post Images and save them to your custom profiles collection that will display on the explore page. MERN stack. To test Live Site, Login with username: Test  password: testuser

name: HAPI Hour
description: An app built to help user find drink recipes from the cocktail db API. You can search by name/ phrase, search by ingredient, choose a random drink, or start with a base ingredient choice and browse. React.js and thecocktaildb API.

name: APItizers | Hackathon
description: An app built to help user find meal recipes from the meal db API. This was a project for the General Assembly SEIR Hackathon where I collaborated in a team of 4. APITIZERS received 1st place in the hackathon. React.js and themealdb API.
